name: Sedako IJKL
description: 1 Undergound parking space is available - number 14.

name: Help Net
description: Pharmacy located 10 minutes away by walking.

name: World Class Timi»ôoara Vox
description: Well equipped gym, a few minutes away from the apartment with higher end machines and equipment.

name: USAMVB Timisoara
description: Bus station, within walking distance from the apartment for buses 17 and 18.

name: OTP Bank
description: Money exchange and ATM available with multiple banks in the Auchan building.

name: Statia de Cafea Vox
description: Nice Cafe with delicious Coffee and snacks.

name: Union Square
description: Known for its colorful and well-preserved Baroque buildings, Union Square is a historical jewel. The square is surrounded by important religious structures, including the Serbian Orthodox Church and the Roman Catholic Cathedral, showcasing the city's diverse cultural heritage. It's also a popular spot for outdoor cafes and festivals, offering a glimpse into the local lifestyle.

name: Victory Square
description: This lively central square is the heart of Timisoara. Lined with elegant baroque buildings, cafes, and shops, it's a perfect spot for leisurely strolls. The square hosts significant events like the Timisoara Flower Festival. Notable landmarks here include the Romanian National Opera and the Metropolitan Cathedral at opposite ends, creating a picturesque setting for photos and leisure.

name: Roses Park
description: A serene retreat in the city, Roses Park is renowned for its beautifully landscaped gardens filled with numerous varieties of roses. The park is especially vibrant during the Rose Festival in June, featuring live music, dance performances, and art installations. It's a lovely spot for relaxation, offering picturesque views and tranquil paths ideal for a peaceful walk.

name: Maria Theresia Bastion
description: Part of the original fortress walls built in the 18th century, Theresia Bastion is a testament to Timisoara's historical military importance. Today, it's a multifunctional space hosting cafes, shops, and exhibitions. Visitors can explore the remnants of the fortress, enjoy a leisurely coffee, or attend one of the many cultural events held here.

name: Liberty Square
description: Open area square with multiple vendors, ad-hoc concerts, gatherings. It connects with pedestrian streets Union Square and Victory Square, cannot miss while visiting city center.

name: Banat Village Museum
description: Set in the lush greenery of Padurea Verde (Green Forest), this open-air ethnographic museum provides insights into the traditional life of the Banat region. Authentic peasant farms, watermills, and churches have been carefully reconstructed on site. Visitors can explore these structures, observe traditional crafts, and experience the rural life of past centuries.

name: NextFit
description: Modern gym with pool with a wide variety of machines available.

name: Altex Timisoara
description: Electronics store with a wide variety of gadgets and accessories.

name: Auchan
description: Supermarket located just 5-10 minutes by walking from the apartment with a great variety of groceries,vegetables, drinks and many more.

name: L'Osterietta
description: Very good italian restaurant, with tasty pizza and good selection of many classic italian foods.

name: "Three Hierarchs" Metropolitan Cathedral
description: This stunning architectural masterpiece dominates the city's skyline with its eleven towers. Built between 1936 and 1946, it features a mix of Moldavian, Byzantine, and Serbian styles. Inside, visitors are treated to beautiful frescoes and a large collection of religious artifacts. The cathedral is especially magnificent during religious ceremonies, radiating a profound spiritual ambiance.

name: Iulius Town
description: Largest shopping mall in Timisoara, with plenty of cafe's, dining options, walking trail, shopping, supermarket etc.

name: Profi
description: Mini-market with a small selection of groceries and drinks that will come in handy during your stay, just few minutes walking.

name: Locanda Del Corso
description: Great little restaurant with tasty food, good service and a great cost/value ration. Very nice for a break while visiting old city center.

name: Soul Caffe
description: Cute and cozy Coffee shop just down stairs from your apartment.
